getComparePeriodsGrossProduct

public StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsGrossProduct(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
Gets the results table for comparing the gross product for two periods

Specified by:
getComparePeriodsGrossProduct in interface StatisticalActivityService
Parameters:
queryParameters -
Returns:
a StatisticalResultDTO containing the median and n for gross products of members for two different periods.

getComparePeriodsLoginTimes

public StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsLoginTimes(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
Description copied from interface: StatisticalActivityService
gets the frequency of logging in of members (per week), comparing the two periods. It should get the values for the two periods, the relative growth percentage between them, and the p-value (indicating if the difference was statistically significant). A value for a period consists of the median amount, plus a number indication the 95%-confidence interval.

Specified by:
getComparePeriodsLoginTimes in interface StatisticalActivityService
Parameters:
queryParameters - the form params
Returns:
a common result value object storing the data

getComparePeriodsNumberTransactions

public StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsNumberTransactions(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
Gets the results table for comparing the number of transactions per member for two periods. Transactions are incoming AND outgoing transactions, in contrast to grossproduct, which concerns only incoming

Specified by:
getComparePeriodsNumberTransactions in interface StatisticalActivityService
Parameters:
queryParameters -
Returns:
a StatisticalResultDTO containing the median and n for number of transactions per member for two different periods.

getComparePeriodsPercentageNoTrade

public StatisticalResultDTO getComparePeriodsPercentageNoTrade(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
gets the percentage of members not trading, where trade concerns incoming and outgoing transactions.

Specified by:

getHistogramGrossProduct

public StatisticalResultDTO getHistogramGrossProduct(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
Description copied from interface: StatisticalActivityService
gets the data for creating a histogram of the distribution of gross product over the members. This data should split up a set of numbers (for each member the personal gross product), and split this set up into reasonable categories, indicating the number of members found in each categorie. This splitting up is done by the class HistogramDTOFactory.

Specified by:
getHistogramGrossProduct in interface StatisticalActivityService
Parameters:
queryParameters - the form params
Returns:
a common result value object storing the data
See Also:
HistogramDTOFactory

getHistogramLoginTimes

public StatisticalResultDTO getHistogramLoginTimes(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
Description copied from interface: StatisticalActivityService
gets the data for creating a histogram of the distribution of login frequency over the members. This data should split up a set of numbers (for each member the personal login frequency per week), and split this set up into reasonable categories, indicating the number of members found in each categorie. This splitting up is done by the class HistogramDTOFactory.

Specified by:
getHistogramLoginTimes in interface StatisticalActivityService
Parameters:
queryParameters - the form params
Returns:
a common result value object storing the data
See Also:
HistogramDTOFactory

getHistogramNumberTransactions

public StatisticalResultDTO getHistogramNumberTransactions(StatisticalActivityQuery queryParameters)
Description copied from interface: StatisticalActivityService
gets the data for creating a histogram of the distribution of the number of transactions over the members. This data should split up a set of numbers (for each member the personal number of transactions), and split this set up into reasonable categories, indicating the number of members found in each categorie. This splitting up is done by the class HistogramDTOFactory.

Specified by:

queryParameters - the form params
Returns:
a common result value object storing the data
